dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Claim]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2006 10:18 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; admin@bingonavigator.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Claim]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Claim
Date:         Wed, 29 Mar 2006 17:58:32 +0200
From:         <admin@bingonavigator.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



One of your customers has based his website bingogameworld.com on material
stolen from my site bingonavigator.com This is a violation of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act.

Please terminate the domain bingogameworld.com (ip 70.84.206.139)

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained
of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I confirm that the information in this notification is accurate, and under
penalty of perjury,  I am the owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.

Regards,
Geir Netland
Intergaming Ltd.
Phone +44 8702856152
Fax +44 8702856153



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEKrNLvK/XpJs6oyURAv92AKCBi52/P6oH6EDPs3FpzKmXxDb5SACfZVsu
/7iAzoufCqXs3WYpjTLrd0M=
=y2o1
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
